summary.span: 表示 UI 自动化树中的一个 UI 自动化元素，并包含由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序用作标识符的值。

span.span: Represents a UI Automation element in the UI Automation tree, and contains values used as identifiers by UI Automation client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于一[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]段, 而不考虑[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础实现 (如或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)])。An corresponds to a piece of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], regardless of underlying implementation (such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]).

span.span: Identifies the property, which is used to identify elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效标识符。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 也可以从或属性检索此属性。This property can also be retrieved from the or properties. 属性的返回值的类型为。Return values of the property are of type . 属性的默认值为空字符串。The default value for the property is an empty string. 当它可用时, 元素的在应用程序的任何实例中都应始终相同, 而不考虑本地语言。When it is available the of an element is expected to always be the same in any instance of the application regardless of the local language. 此值在同级元素中应该是唯一的, 但在整个桌面中不必是唯一的。The value should be unique among sibling elements but not necessarily unique across the entire desktop. 例如, 一个应用程序的多个实例或 Microsoft Windows 资源管理器中的多个文件夹视图可能包含具有相同的元素, 例如 "SystemMenuBar"。For example, multiple instances of an application, or multiple folder views in Microsoft Windows Explorer, may contain elements with the same , such as "SystemMenuBar". 虽然对于更好的可测试性,始终建议使用,此属性不是必需的。While support of an is always recommended for better testability, this property is not mandatory. 在支持它的情况下 , 可用于创建运行的测试自动化脚本, 而不考虑 UI 语言。Where it is supported, an is useful for creating test automation scripts that run regardless of UI language. 客户端不应与其他应用程序公开的有关的假设。Clients should make no assumptions regarding the s exposed by other applications. 不一定一定要跨不同版本的应用程序或不同版本的应用程序进行稳定。An is not necessarily guaranteed to be stable across different releases or builds of an application. 元素的实例由其属性在桌面上唯一标识。 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]Instances of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are uniquely identified on the desktop by their properties. > [!NOTE] > 控件视图中（除顶级应用程序窗口外）的所有 UI 自动化元素、派生自没有 ID 或 x:Uid 的 控件的 UI 自动化元素以及派生自没有控件 ID 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 控件的 UI 自动化元素都支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 。 is supported by all UI Automation elements in the control view except top-level application windows, UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls that do not have an ID or x:Uid, and UI Automation elements derived from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] controls that do not have a control ID. ## Examples 下面的示例检索属性的当前值。The following example retrieves the current value of the property. 如果元素不提供默认值, 则返回默认值。The default value is returned if the element does not provide one. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的集合的视图取决于获取此对象时处于活动状态的的条件。The view of the returned collection is determined by the condition of the that was active when this object was obtained. 仅当包含、 或的范围为时, 才会缓存子级。Children are cached only if the scope of the included , , or . 如果指定的子级在此级别进行缓存, 但没有子级, 则此属性的值为0。If the specified that children were to be cached at this level, but there are no children, then the value of this property is 0. 但是, 如果没有请求在此级别缓存子级, 则尝试检索属性会引发异常。However, if no request was made to cache children at this level, an attempt to retrieve the property raises an exception. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 当处于活动状态且为时, 从父窗口元素获取一个列表框元素。In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a is active and is . 子元素的指定属性 (即列表项) 存储在缓存中, 可以从列表框的中进行检索。The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the of the list box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索范围相对于调用方法的元素。The scope of the search is relative to the element on which the method is called. 元素按它们在树中出现的顺序返回。Elements are returned in the order in which they were encountered in the tree. 在桌面上搜索顶级窗口时, 请确保指定 in `scope`, 而不是。When searching for top-level windows on the desktop, be sure to specify in `scope`, not . 搜索桌面的整个子树可能会循环访问上千个项并导致堆栈溢出。A search through the entire subtree of the desktop could iterate through thousands of items and lead to a stack overflow. 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素, 则[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]必须在单独的线程上进行所有调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用定位窗口中所有已启用的按钮。The following example shows how to use to locate all enabled buttons in a window. summary.span: 检索 上可以单击的点。

span.span: Retrieves a point on the that can be clicked.

returns.span: 一个点的物理屏幕坐标，客户端可以使用该点在此元素单击。

span.span: The physical screen coordinates of a point that can be used by a client to click on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它完全被另一个窗口遮盖,则不可单击。An is not clickable if it is completely obscured by another window. 当满足以下所有条件时,可单击"是":An is clickable when it satisfies all the following conditions: - 它以编程方式可见, 并可[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]用于树。It is programmatically visible and available with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. - 它在其父容器 (如果有) 内全部滚动到视图中。It is scrolled fully into view within its parent container, if any. 如果该元素已被剪裁, 则无法保证它是可单击的。If the element is clipped, there is no guarantee that it is clickable. - 元素未被任何其他 UI 元素遮盖。The element is not obscured by any other UI element. 如果元素由某些 UI 元素部分遮盖, 而不是其上级, 则它可能无法单击。If the element is partially obscured by some UI element other than its ancestors, it might not be clickable. - 包含元素的窗口本身必须是可单击的。The window containing the element must itself be clickable. 例如, 如果包含窗口完全透明, 则窗口不可单击。For example, the window is not clickable if the containing window is completely transparent. 鼠标单击将依次单击到下窗口, 因此透明窗口中的任何控件都不会返回可单击的点。Mouse clicks will click through to the window underneath, so any controls within the transparent window will not return clickable points. - 如果元素是容器 (如列表或树视图), 则它必须具有一个点, 单击该点将使控件的背景成为焦点。If the element is a container (such as list or tree view), it must have a point that when clicked will cause the background of the control to be focused. 如果容器控件的每个部分都由子元素占用, 则它不可单击。If every part of the container control is occupied by a child element, it is not clickable. 不保证当单击由 UI 自动化提供程序定义为可单击的点时, 控件将执行任何操作。There is no guarantee that a control will do anything when clicked on a point defined as clickable by the UI Automation provider. 请考虑使用控件模式来对控件执行操作。Consider using control patterns instead to perform actions on controls. ## Examples 以下代码将检索控件的可单击点, 并将系统光标移动到该点。The following code retrieves a clickable point for a control and moves the system cursor to that point. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#179)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#179)]

span.span: There is no clickable point.

UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效标识符。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent identifier in . 此事件由元素容器在多个元素的可见性信息发生更改时引发。This event is raised by a container of elements whenever the visibility information of many elements has changed. 此事件由客户端用来指示它是否需要刷新以及它可能已为树中的元素缓存的信息。This event is used by the client as an indicator that it needs to refresh the and information that it may have cached for elements within the tree. 触发此事件的建议更改数为25。The recommended number of changes that triggers this event is 25.
